mapper.select: select * from shop WHERE stat = 1 ORDER BY total_sales DESC limit 0,10
mapper.insert: insert into shop(logo_src, shop_name, u_id, license, delivery_cost, min_cost, phone, address_detail) values (#{logoSrc},#{shopName},#{uid},#{license},#{deliveryCost},#{minCost},#{phone},#{addressDetail})
mapper.select: select count(*) from shop where stat in (1,2)
select * from shop where stat in (1,2) limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from shop where stat = 0
select * from shop where stat = 0 limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update shop set shop_name = #{shopName},license = #{license},delivery_cost = #{deliveryCost},min_cost = #{minCost}, total_sales = #{totalSales},phone = #{phone},address_detail = #{addressDetail} where s_id = #{sid}
update shop set stat = #{stat} where s_id = #{sid}
update shop set stat = 1 where s_id = #{sid}
mapper.select: select * from shop where stat = 1 and shop_name like concat('%',#{value},'%')
mapper.update: update shop set shop_name = #{shopName},license = #{license},logo_src = #{logoSrc},delivery_cost = #{deliveryCost},delivery_time = #{deliveryTime},min_cost = #{minCost}, total_sales = #{totalSales},phone = #{phone},address_detail = #{addressDetail},`desc` = #{desc} where s_id = #{sid}
update shop set total_sales = total_sales+1 where s_id = (select s_id from `order` where o_id = #{oid})
